text: Mansour Sarwari (born 30 March 1992) is an Afghan male kurash practitioner who also practiced judo and sambo. He has competed at the 2015 World Judo Championships and took part in the men's +100kg event. He represented Afghanistan at the 2018 Asian Games and claimed a bronze medal in the men's +90kg event. == References == Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Afghan male martial artists Category:Afghan male judoka Category:Kurash practitioners at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for Afghanistan Category:Asian Games medalists in kurash Category:Sambo practitioners at the 2018 Asian Games
title: Mansour Sarwari
